ComicInfo.Title: Canned Music; Man's Best Friend?; Famous Scenes from Great Western Movies...; Do's and Dont's; He's Really a Lone Ranger Now!; Childhood Games and Hobbies of Todays Famous Stars; Make Up Your Own Story; Push-Buttons Unlimited; Monsters in Everything; A Day in the Life of the Average Housewife; Tin Soldiers Brought Up-to-Date
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.A soldier throughs a grenade at a bunker but his K-9 fetches it.
A masked hero and his Native sidekick Toronto are surrounded by a band of Natives, whereupon Toronto switches allegiances.
Four three-panel stories which can rearranged into any sequence.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:45:30. [Issue ID 250404]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Bill Ward, Jack Davis, John Severin
ComicInfo.Inker: Bill Ward, Jack Davis, John Severin
